entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning then light this afternoon. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections late this evening and overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 40 to 50 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 05 February 2023
